thread.title: Best Martini Ever!!
thread.title_full: Best Martini Ever!! - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: nantini2017
title: Best Martini Ever!!
text: Went on a 10 day trip with two friends for a 60th Birthday celebration. We love a good martini and had wonderful martinis at The Aria and Four Seasons in Budapest-Park Hyatt in Vienna among others. We met Essley at The Egerton House in London and he was the grand finale. He seemed like James Bond in his white dinner jacket and had the most welcoming personality. The Hotel is absolutely beautiful and cozy at the same time. Essley made us feel so at home. He made the best martini and the setting was just the ultimate!!!
